Module model¶

This document describes all classes of the module model.

This module performs predictions on text files.

Classes¶

SummerizationModel TagsRecoveringModel

Class¶

class scisum.domain.model.SummerizationModel¶

Wrapper to perform both summarization and title generation. We allow ourselves to centralize everything here as it relies on the same model.

Variables

  • model_name (str) – Name of the model

  • tokenizer_name (str) – Name of the tokenizer

  • framework (str) – Framework to leverage (pt or tf)

  • text_split_max_length (int) – text_split_max_length - attribute of the Tokenizer class, used to split_text

  • tolerance (int) – tolerance around ratio text /summary in number of words

Methods¶

SummerizationModel.summarise(text: str, ratio: float, summarize_only_first_split: int, tolerance: int)¶

Summarise a text.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text to summarise

  • ratio (float) – Ratio text / summary

  • summarize_only_first_split (int) – Summarize only first split if True (1)

  • tolerance (int) – tolerance around ratio text /summary in number of words

Returns

candidate – Summary of the text

Return type

str

SummerizationModel.generate_title(text: str, min_title=1, max_title=15)¶

Generate title from a lead paragraph.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text of the lead paragraph

  • min_title (int) – Min length of the title

  • max_title (int) – Max length of the title

Returns

candidate – Title of the text

Return type

str

Class¶

class scisum.domain.model.TagsRecoveringModel¶

Perform tags recovering task.

Variables

  • model_name (str) – Generic name of the model

  • model_path (str) – Path to the trained model

Methods¶

TagsRecoveringModel.generate_tags(text: str)¶

Generate tags from title and summary.

Parameters

text (str) – Text of the lead paragraph.

Returns

predicted_tags – List of tuple containing predicted tags.

Return type

list
